rules_text:
Double strike
[i]Sword Hand[/i] – Equipment you control have equip {0}.
[i]Vantage+[/i] – Untap each artifact and creature you control during each untap step.
[i]Timeless Hero[/i] – When Owain, Blades Unleashed is put into a graveyard from anywhere, shuffle your graveyard into your library.
[i]Promoted Class[/i] – {2}{W}{U}{B}
